A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi\, is an excellent movie. It took a lot of the tropes and plot points from the Original Trilogy and flipped it on its head. The CGI in the movie was very well done\, many explosions\, very intense moments\, and a nice side-story with Finn and his new partner. I would have preferred more lightsaber battles though. Overall\, it was a five-star movie\, and maybe even better than its predecessor\, The Force Awakens.
